text: Paulo César Vaz Mendes (born ), known as Pauleta, is a Portuguese professional futsal player who plays for Sporting CP and the Portugal national team as a winger. ==References== ==External links== *FPF national team profile *FPF club profile Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese men's futsal players Category:C.F. Os Belenenses futsal players Category:Sporting CP futsal players
title: Pauleta (futsal player)
